hooks.command: case "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" in */reference.yaml|*/pnpm-lock.yaml|*/dist/*) echo 'BLOCKED: Generated file — do not edit directly.' >&2; exit 2;; esac
case "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" in *-snapshots/*) echo 'BLOCKED: Playwright snapshot — run tests with --update-snapshots instead.' >&2; exit 2;; esac
case "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" in *.scss) pnpm exec stylelint --fix "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null;; esac; exit 0
